text: Achen Amar Muktar (, ) is a National Awards-winning Bengali language song from the 1978's Bangladeshi film Golapi Ekhon Traine, which was also won numerous National Awards including Best Film. The song written by Gazi Mazharul Anwar, composed by Alauddin Ali and sung by Syed Abdul Hadi. Veteran actor Anwar Hossain performed with the song. The song gaind popularity from the audience after release of the film. ==Release== The song released as the part of soundtrack album of the Golapi Ekhon Traine, which was release in September 5, 1978. ==Accolades== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- ! width=5%|Year ! width=22%|Awards ! width=24%|Nominated ! width=33%|Category ! width=15%|Result ! width=5%| |- | rowspan="2"| 1979 ! scope="row" rowspan="2"| National Film Awards | Syed Abdul Hadi | Best Male Playback Singer | | rowspan="2" | |- | Alauddin Ali | Best Music Director | |} ==References== Category:Bengali-language songs Category:1978 songs
title: Achen Amar Muktar
